abstract: General Electric’s finance arm on Monday launched a $10 billion sale of F.D.I.C.-backed debt, the largest sale under the government guarantee program since its inception last November.
snippet: General Electric’s finance arm on Monday launched a $10 billion sale of F.D.I.C.-backed debt, the largest sale under the government guarantee program since its inception last November.
lead_paragraph: General Electric‘s finance arm on Monday launched a $10 billion sale of F.D.I.C.-backed debt, the largest sale under the government guarantee program since its inception last November.

headline.main: GE Capital Begins $10 Billion Debt Sale
